channel.title: (Shards) Project no-Doze How do I add newer NPC's?
channel.description:
How would I add newer than 317 NPC's to (Shards) no-Doze? Godwars NPC's for example. Currently when I try to spawn 6260 (Graardor). Nothing appears.
Also, This is not to do with my client, I am using a 474 client.

item.title: (Shards) Project no-Doze How do I add newer NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

wait. never even saw the error console.

getCombatType()
please post that

Read full topic

item.title: (Shards) Project no-Doze How do I add newer NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

Still need help with this.

@Vain_ Im spawning the correct ID’s 100% sure, I have added the NPC into definitions.

Im presented with this error:

[00:00:04]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6260 [00:00:04]: at com.rs2.model.npc.NPCAttacks.getCombatType(NPCAttacks.java:14) [00:00:04]: at com.rs2.model.combat.CombatEngine.getCombatType(CombatEngine.java:280) [00:00:04]: at com.rs2.model.combat.CombatEngine.mainProcessor(CombatEngine.java:359) [00:00:04]: at com.rs2.world.NPCManager.process(NPCManager.java:166) [00:00:04]: at com.rs2.Process.run(Process.java:67) [00:00:04]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I cannot find the int to change that will allow me to spawn NPC’s above 317.

Read full topic

item.title: (Shards) Project no-Doze How do I add newer NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:

you might be spawning the npcs with incorrect client ids.
and make sure the npc data has been added to the npc configs.
